item.description:
The U.S.S. Chowder Pot IV is THE destination of seafood lovers and people traveling from all over Connecticut as well as up and down the East Coast. Conveniently located off exit 27 on Brainard Rd off I-91 in Hartford. The U.S.S. Chowder Pot IV has been the recipient of many Readers Polls for years running... 

Come join us for some terrific seafood and forget about that leftover turkey! We'll also be dancing up a storm in The Captain's Lounge afterward. 

See you all there!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look, or ask, for Terri...Cell is 203-808-5829

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: Hartford Chowder Pot...Forget The Turkey!!!
